items.title: Trump Has Obliterated America’s 30-Year Courtship of India

items.title: A City Reinvented: Paris Is Now Greater Paris

items.title: Happiness Is a Big, Ugly Sofa
items.description: Buying a new, adult couch in a space of my own felt monumental.

items.title: Rural America is suffering an economic crisis as crop prices plunge — ‘U.S. soybean farmers cannot survive a prolonged trade dispute’

items.title: Tesla lawyers ask judge to throw out $243 million verdict, saying mention of Elon Musk misled the jury

items.title: What would the Fed do in a tie vote? It’s not clear, and the Bank of England had to break a deadlock this month
items.description: There have been three occasions when a vote on the FOMC passed by a one-vote majority, though the last time it occurred was in 1973.

items.title: Buford Pusser, famous Tennessee sheriff who inspired Hollywood in the 1970s, may have killed his wife in 1967, authorities say
items.description: There is enough evidence that if Pusser were alive today, prosecutors would present an indictment to a grand jury, said a Tennessee DA.
